item.title: Why i love docker
item.description: 1. The problem This morning, I had a problem: my server, a Raspberry Pi 2 bought in 2016, no longer starts. I used this old machine to host many services (WireGuard, Nextcloud, Bitwarden, ODPS server, etc.). After a few unsuccessful attempts, I gave up on the idea of repairing it and decided to use another one of my servers instead. I unplugged the external hard drive from my Raspberry Pi and plugged it into my other server.

item.title: Blüdhaven
item.description: History Blüdhaven was a former whaling town, which was officially incorporated as a “Commonwealth” in 1912. The town had a generally poor socio-economic populace, owing in part to failed efforts to transform itself into a manufacturing and shipping center.

item.title: Hydra
item.description: Motto Cut off one head and two will take their place

item.title: Tatooine
item.description: A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away…. A project was planned, but never completed
